<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataPL extends data { const CODE = 'PL'; const PREFIX = 48; const REGION = 'Europe'; const PATTERNS = array( '[1-57-9]\d{6}(?:\d{2})?|6\d{5,8}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:1[2-8]|2[2-69]|3[2-4]|4[1-468]|5[24-689]|6[1-3578]|7[14-7]|8[1-79]|9[145])(?:[02-9]\d{6}|1(?:[0-8]\d{5}|9\d{3}(?:\d{2})?))'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:45|5[0137]|6[069]|7[2389]|88)\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{6}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '70[01346-8]\d{6}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '801\d{6}'=>array( 'shared_cost', ), '39\d{7}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{5})'=>'$1', '(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{2,3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
